name: (Vampire, Vrykolakas Master) Children of the Night

description.value:
The presence of a vrykolakas master inspires savage creatures to crawl forth to do its bidding, including @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Rat Swarm]{Rat Swarms}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Warg]{Wargs}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Werewolf]{Werewolves}, and similar creatures.

The vrykolakas master can give telepathic orders to these creatures within 100 feet, but they can't communicate back.
